page.title: 04Fashion for Young People
page.content: Fashion plays an important part in our lives.Fashion manufacturers start their clothes at size 8.There are fashion ranges for all kinds of people: for instance,{Punks,Mods}and fashion conscious teenagers.Most fashions are bought in High street chain stores like{Top Shop,Dorothy {Perkins, Foster & Chelsea Girl}.Most of these shops sell clothes for both sexes and are usually very expensive because of the designers labels.Unfortunately fashion changes constantly and it can be costly to keep up with it.Jewellery is usually worn to add a bit more life to the latest fashions people have bought.Junk jewellery is coloured plastic cut into different shapes for earings and big chunky beads.Men sometimes wear chains and other articles of expensive jewellery.
